project_description: Developed a comprehensive online academic weblog platform to facilitate the sharing of scholarly articles, research papers, and academic discussions among students, professors, and general users. The platform includes user authentication, article management, complaint management, user management, and system configuration.
keyResponsibilities: Designed and developed a responsive user interface using Next.js and TypeScript
Created components optimized for SSR, CSR, and SSG for SEO
Utilized the Mantine React library for modern, consistent UI components
Styled the interface with Tailwind CSS for a modern and visually appealing design
Designed a clean and user-friendly interface
technologies_used: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, Mantine, TinyMCE
